divs: sighting detailsi was driving to work at 5:30 am west on willis rd, just past(west of) whittaker intersection in milan mi. this strange light appeared to the south west- far off. a triangle shape, with 3 lights- steady\not blinking. i have a huge back ground in avionics, and knew it was not a "plane". there for i watched it closely thinking... what the heck is that? it then moved so quickly, all at once it was on top of my car. i locked up the breaks on my car, and jumped out in the street, it shot straight up,...and it was gone! no where! i recently read that on the same day selfrige air force base had the same\similar sightings- confirmed w\washtenaw( sheriffs dept- officers calling in) reporting seeing the same type of things.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Milan
There were no other sightings in Milan on or around March 14th 2011
Summary: Object off in distance, on top of me in sec's...then as quickly gone w/o a trace!
